channel.title: hole on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hole on Barefoot Rob

item.title: dug a hole on the beach
item.description: 23 December 2017 -02 (transcribed 14:54 Sunday 31 December 2017 -02) Dug a hole for myself on the beach but it was too far from the waves to bury me in the sand. Headed down to the water a bit more and meditated with Lin. Kept moving down toward the water so I was in the waves from 0 to 40cm deep, avg 2~10cm. たのしかった Got Godot app to highlight clicked items today and got it to highlight subsequent mouseovered items and unswipe backtracked items.
